name: essentials-claude-code
description: Loops and swarms powered by Claude Code's built-in Task System. Sequential loops for verification. Parallel swarms for speed. Plans define exit criteria. Loops run until tests pass. Done means actually done.
author: GantisStorm

plugins.name: essentials
plugins.description: 22 commands, 9 agents. Loops and swarms powered by Claude Code's built-in Task System. Native task dependencies, ctrl+t progress, automatic persistence.
